alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 12:27PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Norfolk, southeastern Worcester, south central Middlesex and north central Providence Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1227 PM EDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Burrillville, or 7 miles west of Woonsocket, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Milford, Westborough, Ashland, Bellingham, Burrillville, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Holliston, Uxbridge, Medway, Medfield, North Smithfield, Southborough, Blackstone, Douglas, Millis, Upton, Hopedale and Mendon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
